strapiPost.title: Ozark Beer Co. Releases Collaboration With BlackMan Brewing Co.
strapiPost.content:
Ozark Beer Company and BlackMan Brewing Company are excited to release two new collaboration brews during a Juneteenth celebration this Friday, Jun 16, from 5:30-7:30p.

  • Brewing abroad: World traveler and nomadic brewer Barrett Tillman founded BlackMan Brewing after years spent perfecting his craft in the Dallas beer industry. He now collaborates with existing breweries to release specialty products around the world.
  • See what it tastes like: Join the celebration this Friday to sample the session IPA and blonde ale and hear the brewers share what they learned through the months-long collaboration leading up to these new beers.

The event is free, but register to let them know you're coming HERE.
